description: Detects the download of suspicious file type from URLs with IP
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
name: Unusual File Download from Direct IP Address
query: ((Contents:/http[s]?://[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}/) AND file.path.text:("*.ps1\:Zone*" OR "*.bat\:Zone*" OR "*.exe\:Zone*" OR "*.vbe\:Zone*" OR "*.vbs\:Zone*" OR "*.dll\:Zone*" OR "*.one\:Zone*" OR "*.cmd\:Zone*" OR "*.hta\:Zone*" OR "*.xll\:Zone*" OR "*.lnk\:Zone*"))
